See how the top platforms compare in critical business areas

üìß Gmail vs Outlook

Gmail
Winner
  • Superior spam filtering (99.9% accuracy)
  • Better search functionality
  • Seamless integration with other Google services
Outlook
  • ‚Ä¢ Better for desktop Office integration
  • ‚Ä¢ More complex folder management

üé• Google Meet vs Microsoft Teams

Google Meet
Winner
  • Simpler, more intuitive interface
  • No software installation required
  • Better performance on low-bandwidth connections
Microsoft Teams
  • ‚Ä¢ More features but complex interface
  • ‚Ä¢ Better for persistent team chat
  • ‚Ä¢ Requires software installation

ü§ñ Gemini AI vs Copilot AI

Gemini AI
Winner
  • Included in all Google Workspace plans at no extra cost
  • Seamlessly integrated across all apps
  • Real-time collaboration with AI assistance
Microsoft Copilot
  • ‚Ä¢ Additional $30/user/month cost
  • ‚Ä¢ Powerful but expensive for teams
  • ‚Ä¢ Better for deep Office integration

üì± Mobile Experience

Google Workspace
Winner
  • Consistent experience across iOS and Android
  • Offline functionality in all apps
  • Faster app performance and updates
Microsoft 365
  • ‚Ä¢ Feature-rich but can be slow
  • ‚Ä¢ Better document editing on tablets
  • ‚Ä¢ More complex mobile interface
